sentences.en: Andre Lemieux's appointment had followed the abrupt departure of his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 安德烈?雷米尔是他的前任突然离开后被任用的.

sentences.en: David was more politic and successful than his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 大卫比他的前任精明,成就也较大.

sentences.en: He has never exhibited the self-confidence, bordering on arrogance, of his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 他从未表现出他前任的那种近乎傲慢的自信。

sentences.en: He has undone the good work of his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 他已毁弃了他前任者的良好成就.

sentences.en: He is seen as more business-minded than his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 人们认为比起他的前任来，他更有实干精神。

sentences.en: He maintained that he learned everything he knew from his predecessor Kenneth Sisam.
sentences.cn: 他坚称他所知道的一切都获自前任肯尼思·赛瑟姆。

sentences.en: His predecessor was accorded an equally tumultuous welcome.
sentences.cn: 他的前任受到了同样热烈的欢迎。

sentences.en: His style could scarcely be further removed from that of his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 他的风格几乎和他的前辈如出一辙。

sentences.en: It will share the fate of its predecessor.
sentences.cn: 它将遭受与前者同样的命运.

sentences.en: Kennedy’s predecessor as President was the war hero Dwight Eisenhower.
sentences.cn: 肯尼迪总统的前任是战争英雄德怀特·艾森豪威尔。

sentences.en: My present car is much better than its predecessor.
sentences.cn: 我现在的汽车比原来的那辆好得多.

sentences.en: The car is some 40mm shorter than its predecessor.
sentences.cn: 这辆轿车比原先的车型短了约40毫米。

sentences.en: The new ambassador is more mature than his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 新大使比他的前任更成熟一些.

sentences.en: The new governor dismissed the staff that served his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 新州长将前任州长的职员全部解雇.

sentences.en: The ousting of his predecessor was one of the most dramatic coups the business world had seen in years.
sentences.cn: 将他的前任扳倒是商界多年以来最富戏剧性的一场胜利。

sentences.en: The proposed constitution gives him much wider powers than his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 宪法提案赋予他比前任大得多的权力。

trans.tran_cn: 前任，前辈，原有事物，前身，<古>祖先
trans.tran_en: someone who had your job before you started doing it
